title: PODCAST 2-27-2018: Hannah Gais on Russiagate and Vladimir Putin
description:
We're lucky to be joined by freelance writer, full-time grad student, and Russian active measure Hannah Gais to talk about the 2016 election, Russiagate, Vladimir Putin, the state of US-Russia relations, and Russia's many crimes including killing God. I'm opening this episode to the general public for a change, so please share widely.

Hannah's Baffler piece, "Who's Afraid of the Russian Soul?" is here.

Enjoy!
